fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm remote node last-seen refresh
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin on a Watchtower instance and open Nodes â†’ Nodes.
2. Locate a remote Satellite node (for example, gway-002) and note its current "Last seen" timestamp.
3. Select that node and run the "Update nodes" action. Wait for the confirmation banner to report a successful remote update.
4. Reload the changelist (or open the node detail page) and verify the remote node's "Last seen" value now reflects the current time, confirming both local and remote updates were recorded.
